perturbation.original_text:
“Affiliates” shall mean any company or any other entity worldwide, including, without limitation, corporations, partnerships, joint ventures, and
Limited Liability Companies, in which THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION owns at least a five percent ownership, equity,
or financial interest.
perturbation.changed_text: “Affiliates” shall mean any company or any other entity worldwide in which THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION owns at least a controlling interest.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'Affiliates' specifies a minimum ownership of 'at least a five percent ownership, equity, or financial interest.' The modified definition changes this to 'a controlling interest.' This creates a contradiction because 'controlling interest' is a much higher threshold than 5% and has specific legal implications under corporate law, affecting the scope of affiliated entities covered by the contract, especially regarding liability and financial obligations. This misalignment could lead to disputes over which entities are bound by the agreement's terms.

perturbation.original_text:
Revenue is described as all revenue generated from all content including broadcast and disk media, print and online properties. Net Revenue is the
portion of revenue left after all costs associated with production, advertising, promotion and commissions which constitute the costs of sale.
perturbation.changed_text: Revenue is described as all revenue generated from all content including broadcast and disk media, print and online properties. Net Revenue is the revenue remaining at the discretion of THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'Net Revenue' provides a clear calculation method (revenue minus costs). The modified version makes 'Net Revenue' discretionary. This introduces a legal contradiction by conflicting with standard accounting principles and creating uncertainty about how revenue sharing will be determined, potentially violating the implied covenant of good faith and fair dealing.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Implied Covenant of Good Faith and Fair Dealing; Basic Accounting Principles

perturbation.original_text:
ALL DISPUTES ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT SHALL BE SETTLED VIA BINDING ARBITRATION ACCORDING TO THE RULES
AND REGULATIONS SET FORTH BY THE AMERICAN ARBITRATION ASSOCIATION IN SAN DIEGO COUNTY , THE STATE OF
CALIFORNIA.
perturbation.changed_text: ALL DISPUTES ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT SHALL BE SETTLED VIA ARBITRATION, which may or may not be binding, at the sole discretion of PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause mandates 'binding arbitration' under AAA rules. The modification makes arbitration non-binding and gives PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT sole discretion, conflicting with the original agreement to binding arbitration. This undermines the enforceability of the arbitration clause and introduces uncertainty as to whether disputes will be subject to arbitration or litigation, potentially violating contract law principles of mutual agreement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Federal Arbitration Act (FAA); Contract Law - Mutual Agreement
